verbose_text: Therefore, modified Roux-en-Y gastric bypass surgery can promote GLP-1 secretion in patients with T2DM, while reducing the secretion of GIP, thus resulting in better regulation of blood glucose [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: Roux-en-Y gastric bypass surgery can promote GLP-1 secretion in patients with T2DM, while reducing the secretion of GIP
